title: Week 1 preview & Panthers vs. Broncos recap
itunes:title: Week 1 preview & Panthers vs. Broncos recap
description:
A room filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling, and Marc Sessler –  go game-by-game breaking down each Week 1 matchup. Plus, the heroes recap the Super Bowl 50 rematch between the Carolina Panthers and the Denver Broncos.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
